snippet: Defending men's champion Novak Djokovic will play British wildcard James Ward in the first round of the Wimbledon championships on Monday as he continues his bid for a calendar year grand slam....
lead_paragraph: Defending men's champion Novak Djokovic will play British wildcard James Ward in the first round of the Wimbledon championships on Monday as he continues his bid for a calendar year grand slam.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic to Face Wildcard Ward in Wimbledon First Round
headline.main: Djokovic to Face Wildcard Ward in Wimbledon First Round
